thread.section_title: Paypal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paypal | www.paypal.com
thread.title: Bill Hyde

author: Bill Hyde
title: Bill Hyde
text: paypal and eBay are supposed to be separate companies yet eBay still put a hold on your money with paypal when they feel like it and paypal hold your money on items you sell on eBay like i have just sold an ipad for spares and repairs and there excuse is that it is classed as a valuable item and i had to prove proof of posting then when it was delivered i still have to wait 3 days for my money to be released. Wish there was another company to deal with other than rip of paypal who think there god with our money. I for one will be selling as much as i can on local free adds or local swaps and sales on Facebook with NO commision to pay and NO paypal fees for selling and receiving money I HATE PAYPAL
